product_name: The North Face Standard Issue Ear Gear Headband
long_description: An outdoor classic updated with FlashDryTM technology, the Standard Issue Ear Gear headband from The North Face keeps your ears warm and dry when you're cross-country skiing and running.
short_description: An outdoor classic updated with FlashDryTM technology, the Standard Issue Ear Gear headband from The North Face keeps your ears warm and dry when you're cross-country skiing and running.
